scripts.clean: if [ -d "test" ]; then rm -rf test; fi; if [ -d "coverageEnv" ]; then command rm -rf coverageEnv ; fi;
scripts.test: if [ -d "test" ]; then npm run warn; else npm run test-ts; fi;
scripts.coverage: if [ -d "test" ]; then npm run warn; else npm run coverage-ts; fi;
scripts.warn:
echo "Refusing to overwrite 'test' directory. Run '\033[1;33mnpm run clean\033[0m'.
"
scripts.test-ts: trap "npm run clean" INT TERM; (npm run bindings && tsc && truffle test); npm run clean
scripts.coverage-ts: trap "npm run clean" INT TERM; (npm run bindings && tsc && solidity-coverage); npm run clean
scripts.nightly: npm run merge ./.merged/nightly && truffle migrate --network nightly --reset
scripts.testnet: npm run merge ./.merged/testnet && truffle migrate --network testnet --reset
scripts.mainnet: npm run merge ./.merged/mainnet && truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset
